data.prayer: Father, help your children in Banka, Bihar, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Banka, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Banka, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Banka, Bihar, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Banka. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Khetauri people.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Banka.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Banka, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Banka, Bihar, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
